options.label: D

options.label: A
options.text: To enable life in some of the planet's harshest landscapes.

options.label: C
options.text: To increase the speed of melting.

options.label: D
options.text: To reduce the impact of climate change.

options.label: B
options.text: It is increasing the speed of melting.

options.label: C
options.text: It is taking its toll on our planet.

options.label: D
options.text: It is creating more natural glaciers.
